review:
I have been in Aesthetic in the month of October for my 2years prolong  toothache of which the pus form inside the root,  Dr. Smitha  , the most adorable,  patience,  carable doctor for me,  as i was too much sensitive out of prolonged pain  , she take very much care of me during my treatment day's,  i couldn't thank enough her for her care towards me like my own mother , i was very much worried before the treatment and also in times of treatment since my tooth became very much bad even in looks  , in the meanwhile the pain that i  suffered,  i have a  very good time with her,  i irritate her alot because of the pain  , but she never gv up on me,  ( how grateful I'm) , i should call her my stranger Mother üôãüôèüôè, yes indeed  beside  , Aton play a very important role along with Doctor,  helping in every of my needs during the treatment day's  , As my treatment process for 2month 9days ,  (root  canal treatment with fillings to  crown I'm fully satisfied what Doctor Smitha  have been into for.   I'm very much worthy for what i have spend my time and  money tooooooooo. 
 
 Love n like to recommend  who have been suffering from dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hello,
I would like to share my experience with Dr. Smitha Augustine at Karishma Asthetics in a few sentences. 
Dental and oral health is an essential part of  well being and it definitely plays an important role in uplifting one's look . I visited Dr.Smitha with my already existing dental issue after visiting couple of other dentist and I must say she made sure I felt safe and explained the issue in detail and also answered to all my queries with examples such that a layman will understand and helped me take a decision and provided me with the best treatment in a timely manner. 
Dr. Smitha, thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Let me begin by saying, I am one among those people who are afraid of any dental procedures due to the pain ensued and I‚Äôve always had sensitive teeth, so I usually suffer from severe pain during or after the procedure, this being my experience, I was scared about the visit but come the day, I was greeted by the warm smiles at the front desk and taken straight to the doctor, who is really warm, takes time to understand all your problems and gives the best solution out there, ** ** *********** ** ****** ** *** **** ******* **** **** *** *** **** **** ** * *** ** ********* she is not just extremely sweet but so smooth in the procedure as well, I felt nothing both during and after the procedure! Post procedure too she kept reminding me the dos and don‚Äôts, she is one of the best doctors around and I strongly strongly recommend her, I will be keeping up to date with all my dental appointments now on!
reply_text: Thank you so much nidhi for your valuable feedback ,....you are such sweet patient too ,thank you for trusting in us .....thanks in behave of dr karishma AESTHETICS team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a Dental appointment at Dr Karishma Aesthetics with Dr. Smitha Madam. She was extremely polite & really crisp at explaining issues. Also her calm & composed mindset, makes it so easy to explain your problems. So lucky to have found her. Definitely would suggest her for any Dental consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I have been consulting with Dr Smitha for more than three years. Being a senior person, she has been a great support in explaining the situation and how to manage dental issues well. I was very comfortable to get the dental service from her. She helped me a lot by giving accurate advice and treatment option even while I was on travel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The best dental appointment I have had till date. Dr. Smitha is so considerate, understanding *** ************** I would recommend her to everyone.
reply_text: Thank you krishna ....it's nice to hear from good patients lyk you..
